title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, list models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package offering Ollama LLM, embeddings and tool-calling components.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, multi-model, file upload, RAG, admin panel).

title: ollama-cli (mattw/ollama-cli)
summary: Interactive TUI for Ollama with history, syntax highlighting, model switching.

title: ollama-copilot (sammcj/ollama-copilot)
summary: GitHub Copilot-like VS-Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline suggestions.

title: ollama-helm (otwld/ollama-helm)
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama4j (ollama4j/ollama4j)
summary: Java/JVM client library for Ollama (Spring Boot starters, Kotlin coroutines).

title: ollama-rag (ggerganov/ollama-rag)
summary: Lightweight RAG pipeline using Ollama embeddings + llama.cpp for vector search.

title: ollama-npm (npm package)
summary: Official NPM wrapper for Ollama REST API; same feature set as ollama-js repo.

title: ollama (PyPI)
summary: Official Python package to interact with local Ollama server; install via pip install ollama.

title: ollama-haystack (deepset-ai)
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder nodes.

title: ollama-camunda (camunda-community-hub/ollama-camunda)
summary: Camunda 8 connector that calls Ollama models from BPMN service tasks.

title: ollama-rust (pepperoni21/ollama-rust)
summary: Async Rust crate wrapping Ollama REST endpoints; tokio/hyper based.

title: ollama-discord-bot (ciroque/ollama-discord)
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that chats using any Ollama model with slash commands.

title: ollama-dagger (dagger/dagger)
summary: Dagger CI module example showing how to cache and test Ollama models in pipelines.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot (imartinez/ollama-rag-chatbot)
summary: Streamlit chatbot template that combines Ollama LLM & embeddings for private RAG.

title: ollama-obsidian (joethei/obsidian-ollama)
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds AI autocomplete & summarization via local Ollama models.

title: r/ollama - Local LLMs ecosystem discussion
summary: Active subreddit for sharing new tools, models, and troubleshooting Ollama integrations.
